title: Romeo Must Die
description: Tepper Gibbons and Mardones "Marty" Hamm are paranormal investigators hired to investigate the spooky goings-on at old theater. But after a sandbag renders Marty unconscious, he suddenly finds himself in the real life world of Romeo and Juliet. A stranger in a strange land, Marty realizes that it his mission to descend into the Capulet family crypt and stop the young, star crossed lovers from enacting their famous suicide.Meanwhile, Tepper and the acting troupe are locked inside the theater with a bloodthirsty killer hiding in the shadows, seeking revenge.
author: Greg Stanina
